preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) From concept_reference_term where `code` in ("MZZ JN AA","ACA LB AA","PZZ LC AH","MRJ LE AA","MRB AD AA","MRJ AD AA","MRB ML AA","LZZ DK AZ","PZZ SM AH","LZZ AD AE","MRB LD AH","LZZ JG AH","ACA JJ AA","LZZ JG AA","PZX DL AE","MRS AD AA","MRB LD AA","ACA FC AA","PZX LC AH","PME ML AA","LAA JJ AA","PZZ KB AH","LZZ JD AA","MRB DN AA","MRB JJ AA","MZZ LC AH","MRT ML AA","MRT FB AA","MRT LJ AA","JBA LI AA","PZX JB AE") and retired = 0 and concept_source_id = ( select concept_source_id from concept_reference_source where name = "ICHI" and retired =0 );

changeSet.comment: Adding codes to SNOMED

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("OPD","IPD") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "IME, Patient admitted to:");

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Burn contracture of skin","Other Pathologies","Peripheral vascular disease","Arteriovenous aneurysm","Pyogenic","Valgus deformity","Varus deformity","Flexion deformity","Acquired wrist or foot drop","Acquired flat foot","Acquired clawhand, clubhand, clawfoot, and clubfoot","Acquired unequal limb length","Other acquired deformities of limb","Chronic instability of knee","Disorder of ligament","Recurrent dislocation of joint","Contracture of joint","Ankylosis of joint","Joint derangement","Fistula of joint","Flail joint","Instability of joint","Stiffness of joint","Osteophyte","Joint disorder","Foreign body granuloma of soft tissue","Calcification and ossification of muscle","Disorder of muscle","Contracture of muscle","Spontaneous rupture of extensor tendons","Spontaneous rupture of flexor tendons","Spontaneous rupture of other tendons","Short Achilles tendon","Contracture of tendon","Soft tissue disorder related to use, overuse, and pressure","Bursopathy","Malunion of fracture","Nonunion of fracture","Delayed union of fracture","Disorder of continuity of bone","Acute osteomyelitis","Chronic osteomyelitis","Osteonecrosis due to previous trauma","Other disorders of bone","Fracture of bone following insertion of orthopaedic implant, joint prosthesis, or bone plate","Congenital malformation of spinal cord","Congenital malformation of musculoskeletal system","Injuries of nerves involving multiple body regions","Multiple fractures","Multiple dislocations, sprains and strains","Multiple crushing injuries","Traumatic ischaemia of muscle","Post-traumatic wound infection","Traumatic compartment syndrome","Late Effect of Tendon Injury","Disruption of wound","Disruption of traumatic injury wound repair","Complications of internal orthopaedic prosthetic devices, implants and grafts","Infection and inflammatory reaction due to internal fixation device","Bone graft failure","Bone graft infection","Neuroma of amputation stump","Infection of amputation stump","Necrosis of amputation stump","Other complications of amputation stump","Superficial injury","Open wound of upper limb","Open wound of lower limb","Closed fracture","Open fracture","Dislocation, sprain and strain","Injury of nerve","Injury of blood vessel","Injury of muscle and tendons","Crushing injury","Traumatic amputation at shoulder joint","Traumatic amputation at level between shoulder and elbow","Traumatic amputation at elbow level","Traumatic amputation at level between elbow and wrist","Traumatic amputation of hand at wrist level","Traumatic amputation of two or more fingers alone","Traumatic amputation at hip joint","Traumatic amputation between hip and knee","Traumatic amputation at knee level","Traumatic amputatin at level between knee and ankle","Traumatic amputation of foot at ankle level","Traumatic amputatin at other parts of foot","Traumatic amputation involving multiple body region") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "IME, Main Diagnosis (surgical)");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Main Diagnosis (surgical)

changeSet.author: Sreekalyan

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Type 1 diabetes mellitus","Type 2 diabetes mellitus","Acute and subacute endocarditis","Acute Ischaemic Heart Disease","Acute myocarditis","Acute pericarditis","Angina Pectoris","Arterial embolism and thrombosis","Atherosclerosis","Cardiac Arrest","Cardiac Tamponade","Cardiogenic Shock","Cardiomyopathy","Chronic ischaemic heart disease","Heart Disease","Heart Failure","Hypertension","Hypertensive Heart Disease","Hypertensive Renal Disease","Hypotension","Myocardial infarction","Phlebitis and Thrombophlebitis","Postprocedural disorders of circulatory system","Pulmonary Embolism","Pulmonary valve disorders","Secondary Hypertension","Stroke","Other Pathologies") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "IME, Medical Diagnoses (if any)");

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Amputation","Anastomosis, graft, suture of Peripheral Nerve","Application of an external fixation device","Application of cast","Arthrodesis","Biopsy of bone","Biopsy of joint structure","Bone graft","Change of dressing","Change or adjustment of external fixation device","Closed biopsy of skin and subcutaneous cell tissue","Closed reduction of fracture, with/without pin","Dermabrasion","Excision of peripheral neuroma","Excisional debridement of wound, infection, or burn","Insertion of drain or tube","Insertion of (cement) spacer","Open biopsy of soft tissue","Open reduction of fracture alone","Peripheral nerve or ganglion decompression or lysis of adhesions","Plaster of Paris (POP)","Pollicisation of finger or thumb","Reamputation of stump","Release [excision] scar contracture","Removal of an external fixation device","Removal of drain or tube","Removal of foreign body or device from skin and subcutaneous cell tissue","Removal of sutures (clips etc.), skin","Replacement of (cement) spacer","Revision of amputation stump","Secondary closure of stump","Sequestrectomy","Skeletal traction","Tendon graft","Tendon release","Tendon transfer or transplantation","Tracheostomy","Trimming of stump","Wound drainage","Corrective osteotomy","Insertion of Central Line","Open reduction of fracture with nail/plate","Regional flap","Advancement of flap","Application of back slab","Arthrolysis","Axial Flap","Bone debridement","Bone lengthening","Capsulectomy procedure","Coronoidectomy","Delayed suture of wound","Division of flap","Dynamization of external fixator","Elongation of tendon achilles (ETA) ","Epiphysiodesis","Excision of head of ulna","Exploration of nerve","Filling of segmental defect by bone transport","Fixation of fracture using pins","Full thickness skin graft","Grafting of cartilage","Injection of steroid","Insertion of PICC line (peripherally inserted central catheter)","Integra skin graft","Internal fixation using intramedullary nail","Internal fixation using plate","Internal fixation using screw","Internal fixation using wire","Joint capsulodesis","Ligament reconstruction","Local rotation flap","Local subcutaneous pedicled V-Y flap","Lysis of adhesions of tendon / tenolysis","Manipulation under anesthesia","Nerve block","Nerve graft","Neurorrhaphy / suture of nerve","Open reduction of fracture with K-wire","Osteotomy","Partial thickness skin graft","Peripheral vascular shunt or bypass","Plastic repair by z plasty","Posteromedial release of clubfoot","Quadricepsplasty","Removal of external fixator pin","Removal of K-wire","Removal of nail","Removal of plate from bone","Removal of screws from bone","Repair of tendon","Revision of scar","Skin flap operation","Skin graft operation","Tenorrhaphy / suture of tendon","Thinning of skin flap") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "IME, Procedure performed");

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Pharmacology","Physiotherapy","Nursing Care","Mental Health Support") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "IME, Treatment Plan");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to IME, Treatment Plan

changeSet.author: Sreekalyan

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Analgesia","DVT prophylaxis","Antibiotics","Vitamins") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "IME, Pharmacology treatment");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to IME, Pharmacology treatment

changeSet.author: Sreekalyan

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Nociceptive","Neuropathic","Mixed") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "IME, Type of pain");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to IME, Pharmacology treatment

changeSet.author: Sivakrishna

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_name where name = "IME, Gait training, comments";

changeSet.comment: Adding IME, Gait training, comments
changeSet.sql: call add_concept(@concept_id,@concept_short_id,@concept_full_id,"IME, Gait training, comments","Gait training, comments","Text","Misc",false);

changeSet.author: Sivakrishna

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Other") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "IME, Specify type of gait training");

changeSet.comment: Adding Other to IME, Specify type of gait training

changeSet.author: Sivakrishna

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_name where name in ( "IME, Main Diagnosis (surgical), other", "IME, Medical Diagnoses, other","Injury of brachial plexus");

changeSet.comment: Create "IME, Main Diagnosis (surgical), other" , "IME, Medical Diagnoses, other" and "Injury of brachial plexus" concepts

changeSet.author: SivaKrishna

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Injury of brachial plexus") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "IME, Main Diagnosis (surgical)");

changeSet.comment: Adding Injury of brachial plexus as answer to Main Diagnosis (surgical)

changeSet.author: SivaKrishna

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) From concept_reference_term where `code` in ("S14.3") and retired = 0 and concept_source_id = ( select concept_source_id from concept_reference_source where name = "ICD-10" and retired =0 );

changeSet.comment: Adding codes to ICD-10
